pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This fork is for security updates (with latest stable) and PGO support.
See also
https://github.com/orsonteodoro/oiledmachine-overlay#epgo https://github.com/orsonteodoro/oiledmachine-overlay#custom-trainer
for details on PGO support and custom PGO training.

use.flag: Enable if the user plans to run the package under a pax enabled hardened kernel
Make mono generate code that is considerably faster on xen VMs but slightly slower on for normal systems.
